commands.name: Summarize selection
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Summarize the text in a view sentences highlighting the key takeaways. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Explain selection
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Explain the text in simple and concise terms keeping the same meaning. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Expand selection
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Expand the text by adding more details while keeping the same meaning. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Rewrite selection (formal)
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Rewrite the text in a more formal style while keeping the same meaning. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Rewrite selection (casual)
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Rewrite the text in a more casual style while keeping the same meaning. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Rewrite selection (active voice)
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Rewrite the text in with an active voice while keeping the same meaning. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Rewrite selection (bullet points)
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Rewrite the text into bullet points while keeping the same meaning. Output only the text and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point.

commands.name: Caption selection
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Create only one single heading for the whole text that is giving a good understanding of what the reader can expect. Output only the caption and nothing else, do not chat, no preamble, get to the point. Your format should be ## Caption.

commands.name: Create callouts
commands.prompt: Act as a writer. Create some callouts from the following text using the obsidian format, with [!example],[!tip], [!info], [!warning] and in each new line of the callout start with the character >. Write only the sequence of callouts, do not add additional text.
